```{r chunk_setup, include=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  # code
  echo      = TRUE,
  message   = FALSE,
  warning   = FALSE,
  error     = FALSE,
  comment   = NA,
  R.options = list(width = 220),
  # viz
  dev.args  = list(bg = 'transparent'),
  dev       = 'svglite',
  fig.align = 'center',
  out.width = '75%',
  fig.asp   = .75,
  # cache
  cache.rebuild = FALSE,
  cache         = TRUE
)
```

```{r load_common_packages, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(patchwork)

kable_df = function(data, digits = 3, ...) {
  kableExtra::kable(
    data,
    digits = digits,
    format = 'html',
    booktabs = T,
    # longtable = F,
    linesep = "", 
    ...,
  ) %>% 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(full_width = F)
}

theme_set(visibly::theme_clean())
```
